thread.title: BRIEF-Eagle Point Commenced An Underwritten Public Offering Of $50 Mln Aggregate Principal Amount Of Unsecured Notes Due 2028

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Eagle Point Commenced An Underwritten Public Offering Of $50 Mln Aggregate Principal Amount Of Unsecured Notes Due 2028

organizations.name: brief-eagle point commenced an underwritten public offering of

text:
Market News  14 PM / Updated 17 minutes ago BRIEF-Eagle Point Commenced An Underwritten Public Offering Of $50 Mln Aggregate Principal Amount Of Unsecured Notes Due 2028 Reuters Staff 
April 17 (Reuters) - Eagle Point Credit Company Inc: 
* EAGLE POINT CREDIT COMPANY INC. ANNOUNCES OFFERING OF NOTES 
* EAGLE POINT CREDIT COMPANY INC - COMMENCED AN UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF $50 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF UNSECURED NOTES DUE 2028 
* EAGLE POINT CREDIT COMPANY INC - COMPANY INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING OF 2028 NOTES TO REDEEM COMPANYâ€™S UNSECURED NOTES DUE 2020 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
